name: o2a2-Knife says
description:
When you come to work like normal, and your kitchen knife started to talk to you, what would you say?

is a shot visual novel telling a story that a knife talks to you about seemingly absurd topics. 

Make your own choices and see what's going to happen ---- next and in the end.

To save your time, there is only one ending according to the words count limitation of the jam. But you still can try different ways of reaching it.
